title: The Shoemaker
creator_credit: Adam Nudelman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Artist Adam Nudelman asks himself why he always paints shoes? Behind these objects lies a story about family and loss and brings him closer to his Jewish heritage. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia
creator_credit_for_label: Adam Nudelman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
